newsitem.title: TURKEY: TURK BREWER EGE BIRACILIK PLANS CASH DIVIDEND.
newsitem.headline: TURK BREWER EGE BIRACILIK PLANS CASH DIVIDEND.

text.p: Turkish brewery Ege Biracilik ve Malt Sanayii AS said it would offer a 500 lira cash dividend per 1,000 lira nominal-valued existing share at an extraordinary meeting of shareholders and directors on November 25.

In a statement sent to the Istanbul Stock Exchange, Ege Biracilik said the total dividend payout would be 788.26 billion lira, or 50 percent of its 1.577 trillion lira capital, if approved at the meeting.
Ege Biracilik is part of Turkish brewery, beverage, automotive and stationery group Anadolu Endustri Holding which produces Turkey's leading Efes Pilsen brand with four malt and beer plants.
